mapper.sql: a.xuhao AS "xuhao", a.zaitimingcheng AS "zaitimingcheng", a.zaitibianhao AS "zaitibianhao", a.miji AS "miji", a.fenshu AS "fenshu", a.yeshu AS "yeshu", a.fc_id AS "fcId", a.fk_id AS "fkId", a.zaitizhuangtai AS "zaitizhuangtai", a.id AS "id", a.form_id AS "formId", a.proc_sno AS "procSno", a.data_secret_level AS "dataSecretLevel", a.version AS "version", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_by_dept AS "createByDept.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO efm_uubejtefnl( xuhao, zaitimingcheng, zaitibianhao, miji, fenshu, yeshu, fc_id, fk_id, zaitizhuangtai, id, form_id, proc_sno, data_secret_level, version, create_by, create_by_dept, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{xuhao}, #{zaitimingcheng}, #{zaitibianhao}, #{miji}, #{fenshu}, #{yeshu}, #{fcId}, #{fkId}, #{zaitizhuangtai}, #{id}, #{formId}, #{procSno}, #{dataSecretLevel}, #{version}, #{createBy.id}, #{createByDept.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE efm_uubejtefnl SET xuhao = #{xuhao}, zaitimingcheng = #{zaitimingcheng}, zaitibianhao = #{zaitibianhao}, miji = #{miji}, fenshu = #{fenshu}, yeshu = #{yeshu}, fc_id = #{fcId}, fk_id = #{fkId}, zaitizhuangtai = #{zaitizhuangtai}, form_id = #{formId}, proc_sno = #{procSno}, data_secret_level = #{dataSecretLevel}, version = #{version}, create_by_dept = #{createByDept.id}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
